Our Corporate Citizenship Framework
Moderna’s corporate responsibility strategy considers the needs and priorities 
of our key stakeholders and the areas where we believe we can have a direct 
impact today and in the future. Our work now and beyond is centered on five 
focus areas:Who are our Stakeholders? 
By identifying and engaging with the groups that impact— or are impacted 
by—our business, we can better align our company’s corporate responsibility 
activities to their long-term objectives. We have identified and defined our 
key stakeholders and will continue working to understand their interests as we 
grow and advance our potential medicines through our pipeline. Moderna’s 
stakeholders include:
